long_description: The cavernous, 3-season Marmot Limestone 8P Tent brings 2 rooms of livable space for 8 people to your campsite, along with easy setup, plenty of headroom and lots of pockets to store your gear. Spacious dome design and removable room divider offer luxurious livability; mesh door, ceiling and side panels increase ventilation to help reduce condensation buildup. 2 large doors provide easy access; roomy vestibules protect entrances and store gear. Front dual-zipper vestibule door lets you create a covered portico when coupled with trekking poles (sold separately). Combination pole sleeve and clip system combines advantages of both designs, and allows swift, freestanding setup even in the wind; DAC DA17 poles are strong and reliable. UV-resistant, seam-taped polyester rainfly provides full coverage and doesn't stretch or expand when wet, ensuring a consistently taut pitch. Heavyweight oxford nylon canopy floor is fully taped for complete protection. Luxury touches include a hanging organizer and door mat. The Marmot Limestone 8P Tent comes with stuff sacks, stakes and guylines/tighteners.
short_description: The cavernous, 3-season Marmot Limestone 8P Tent brings 2 rooms of livable space for 8 people to your campsite, along with easy setup, plenty of headroom and lots of pockets to store your gear.
